fairelc.description: National elections are free and fair
fairelc.question: How important do you think it is for democracy in general that national elections are free and fair?

values.0: Not at all important for democracy in general
values.10: Extremely important for democracy in general

dfprtal.description: Different political parties offer clear alternatives to one another
dfprtal.question: How important do you think it is for democracy in general that different political parties offer clear alternatives to one another?

values.0: Not at all important for democracy in general
values.10: Extremely important for democracy in general

medcrgv.description: The media are free to criticise the government

values.0: Not at all important for democracy in general
values.10: Extremely important for democracy in general

rghmgpr.description: The rights of minority groups are protected
rghmgpr.question: How important do you think it is for democracy in general that the rights of minority groups are protected?

values.0: Not at all important for democracy in general
values.10: Extremely important for democracy in general

votedir.description: Citizens have the final say on political issues by voting directly in referendums

values.0: Not at all important for democracy in general
values.10: Extremely important for democracy in general

values.0: Not at all important for democracy in general
values.10: Extremely important for democracy in general

gptpel.description: Governing parties are punished in elections when they have done a bad job

values.0: Not at all important for democracy in general
values.10: Extremely important for democracy in general

values.0: Not at all important for democracy in general
values.10: Extremely important for democracy in general

values.0: Not at all important for democracy in general
values.10: Extremely important for democracy in general

viepol.description: The views of ordinary people prevail over the views of the political elite
viepol.question: How important do you think it is for democracy in general that the views of ordinary people prevail over the views of the political elite?

values.0: Not at all important for democracy in general
values.10: Extremely important for democracy in general

values.0: Not at all important for democracy in general
values.10: Extremely important for democracy in general

values.0: Not at all important for democracy in general
values.10: Extremely important for democracy in general

chpldm.description: Best for democracy: government changes policies in response to what most people think
chpldm.question: Which one of the statements describes what you think is best for democracy in general?

values.2: Government should stick to its policies

chpldmi.question: How important do you think it is for democracy in general that the government changes its planned policies in response to what most people think?

values.0: Not at all important for democracy in general
values.10: Extremely important for democracy in general
